ModMetaData.name: BloodTypes - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: AliceCecil
ModMetaData.description: Adds blood types, transfusion and other bonuses and mishaps related there in (This is the dev version of BloodTypes. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
